price: 99. Si, realmente, (los ídolos) que adoraban hubiesen sido verdaderas divinidades, no habrían entrado al fuego; mas todos permanecerán allí eternamente.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
